name: Formal training and education
description: Formal training, or equivalent experience, in Computer Science.

name: Independence
description: The engineer can code up anything the lead asks. If the engineer does not know how, the engineer knows who to ask, or who to ask who to ask.

name: Team leadership
description: The engineer influence the rest of the team of roughly 3 – 12 engineers.  The influence comes as their managing lead or as their technical lead. Either way, the engineer's impact extends beyond what he or she can do alone.

name: Group leadership
description: The engineer influences the entire organization, of 80 – 500 engineers,  as the discipline director, general manager, partner architect, or core technology worldwide expert. The engineer has become a partner at the company.

name: Industry leadership
description: The engineer influences the entire division, and with it the entire industry (from 500 to millions of engineers), as a distinguished engineer, technical fellow, or vice president.
